abstract: Who knew that through all of those quasi-retirements, through his stints with the Jets and the Vikings, Brett Favre was just impatiently waiting for Aaron Rodgers to close the deal?
snippet: Who knew that through all of those quasi-retirements, through his stints with the Jets and the Vikings, Brett Favre was just impatiently waiting for Aaron Rodgers to close the deal?

headline.main: Week 5 N.F.L. Matchups: Another Turning Point
headline.print_headline: Packers Took Flight After Raising the Roof
